attributes.action: force all crisp companies to use the correct colour packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everybody in this country knows that Salt & Vinegar should be in blue packs and Cheese & Onion in Green packs. 
The likes of Walkers are trying to make fools out of us by swapping them around.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
